item.description:
All,

The last few weeks have not been very cooperative weather-wise, but hopefully we can get a nice Saturday this week to play some flag-football.

All skill levels are encouraged to participate. The focus is on having fun while playing flag-football. Its great whether you come to play flag-football or just to get some exercise. Hope to see you this weekend.

See you Saturday!

-Cambridge Flag-Footballers
item.name: Flag Football - Sat. 2PM - Cambridge Common
